name: Bromous acid
desc: Bromous acid is the inorganic compound with the formula of HBrO2. It is an unstable compound, although salts of its conjugate base - bromites - have been isolated. In acidic solution, bromites decompose to bromine.

images.alt: Space-filling model of the bromous acid molecule

Other anions: Hydrobromic acid; hypobromous acid; bromic acid; perbromic acid
